data.eml:eml: Brounea, a new genus (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from New Zealand, with descriptions of nine new species

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Park, Jong-Seok, Carlton, Christopher E. (2015): Brounea, a new genus (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Pselaphinae) from New Zealand, with descriptions of nine new species. Zootaxa 3990 (4): 551-566, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3990.4.4
